colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA RNAL 'BYOR ROL PA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG ZHVA DMAR SNGAGS PA GU RU BKRA SHIS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG, LHA 'DI NYID YI DAM DU BYED PA MANG PO LA'ANG PHAN PAR MTHONG NAS RGYAL KHAMS NYUL BA'I DHARMA BADZRA GYIS CHO GA 'KHOR SPYI DANG SGO BSTUN CING YIG RNYING GI DGONGS PA DANG YANG MI 'GAL BAR, ,SNA TSOGS DBYIG CES PA SHING MO SBRUL GYI LO MI'I DBANG WA DA RATNA SIDDHI'I PHO BRANG SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG KUN DGAS @010B BGYIS SO,, ,,)
dates_of_the_author_(зохиогдсон_өдөр): SNA TSOGS DBYIG CES PA SHING MO SBRUL GYI LO,
